reporting.reporttable.TableQuery:
IF @FromDate <= @ToDate BEGIN SET @FromDate ={%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_DateTrim(@FromDate,'month');
SELECT DATENAME(MONTH,[Date])+', '+ DATENAME(YEAR, [Date]) AS '{$ecommerce.report_month$}', CAST(SUM(ISNULL(OrderGrandTotalInMainCurrency,0)) AS DECIMAL(38,1)) AS '{$com.sales.volumeofsales$}' FROM {%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_EnsureDates (@FromDate,@ToDate,'month') AS Dates LEFT JOIN COM_Order ON ([Date] <= OrderDate AND DATEADD(MONTH,1,[Date]) > OrderDate) AND OrderSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID GROUP BY [Date] ORDER BY [Date] DESC END
